description: The RealFleece™ High Pile Mittens are super-cozy mittens ideal for super-cold days. Featuring icebreaker’s high-loft merino wool RealFleece™ fabric that’s not only warm but incredibly soft, these mitts also feature a versatile flip-back mitten design that reveals a fingerless glove for more dexterous tasks. A 100% merino jersey lining and cuff provide a soft next-to-skin feel and enhanced moisture management. <br><br>Superfine merino fibers are brushed to create icebreaker RealFleece®, a natural fleece that warms and breathes next to your skin. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: RealFleece High Pile Mittens
